subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With his team’s position in the playoffs locked, Giants Coach Tom Coughlin must choose whether the best strategy is to rest key players or to take a serious stab at upsetting the Patriots.
snippet: With his team’s position in the playoffs locked, Giants Coach Tom Coughlin must choose whether the best strategy is to rest key players or to take a serious stab at upsetting the Patriots.
